name: SoulBind
description:
Hello and thank you for participating in this round of feedback for our upcoming game. As we are still in the initial development stages of this project we wanted to gather as much feedback as we could on this prototype of the game. SoulBind will be an isometric quest driven RPG set in a medieval setting.

After playing please fill out this form to help us improve the game.
https://forms.gle/3UpSNBaJRis7HkCw7
